formatted_address: C-GF-23, ION AXXES, Persiaran Medini Sentral 6, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Kuntum & Brew

reviews.text:
I had a fantastic experience at Kuntum & Brew! We tried their creamy Tomyam spaghetti, chicken chop, and spaghetti carbonara ‚Äî and everything was delicious. The Tomyam spaghetti was especially memorable, perfectly balancing creaminess with just the right amount of spicy kick. The chicken chop was juicy and tender, and the carbonara was rich without feeling too heavy.

The caf√© itself has a lovely English-style d√©cor that creates such a cozy and charming atmosphere. On top of that, the staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making the whole dining experience even better.

Definitely a spot I‚Äôd love to return to ‚Äî highly recommend!

I went here for lunch and overall the experience is not quite good. Last week my friend went here and got roasted potato, today we go here again to try the chicken chop but got wedges instead. The food is good but not consistent.
I ordered Peach lychee tea & my expectation is there will be lychee in it, but noooo!! The price is not worth it with this kind of taste.
The service is terribleee‚Ä¶ we have to wait for 1 hour just for our Ayam Ungkep which should not be that long to arrive. One of my friend who also order ayam ungkep decide to takeaway instead of dine in because its too longgggggg‚Ä¶
Please improve your service, your food and better to put QR scan for menu order so that can improve efficiency.

Truly hidden gems!
I'm not kidding, i swear to god the foods are great! Beyond my expectations. Break fast with my girlfriend, we ordered chicken chop & creamy pasta tom yum.
üòã The gravy was delicious. Will come back. Totally recommended üëåüëç

Nice place with a good vibes. Bring my mom try their local food & the taste so good. You guys should nasi ayam ungkep their special menu. Also the pasta taste good! Their staff very friendly give us free dessert. They got nice cookies & many choice for dessert ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
The place has nice atmosphere with a good ambiance but the food was just average. the gravy wasn‚Äôt hot even though we had to wait quite a while. a bit disappointing in that aspect.
